p:
In the present specification, R 3 includes preferably, for example, a hydrogen atom, a C1-4 aliphatic hydrocarbon group which may have a substituent(s), a C1-4 aliphatic hydrocarbon group which is substituted with an optionally protected hydroxyl group, and also may have a substituent(s), or a C1-4 aliphatic hydrocarbon group which is substituted with an optionally protected carboxyl group, and also may have a substituent(s). R 3 is also preferably:
(a) -Y 1-Z or
(wherein all symbols have the same meanings as described above).
